name: Prostor
description:
THIS IS A ENDLESS RUNNING GAME , WHERE YOU HAVE A SHIP WHICH UPGRADES AFTER 100 SHIP POINTS AT EVERY SHIP UPGRADE SOMETHING NEW IS INTRODUCED IN THE GAME.
THIS GAME HAS TWO MODES OF PLAYING 
1.NORMAL MODE 
2.AUGMENT REALITY 
THE NORMAL MODE IS LIKE NORMAL GAMES WITH IT'S OWN SORROUNDING BUT IN AR MODE THE GAME WILL RUN IN YOUR REAL SORROUNDING
